description: I. The healthy NHS board principles for good governance. Incl. appendices. 22 p. II. Letter dated 23/02/2010 from Jo Williams (Interim Chair, Care Quality Commission) to Andy Burnham MP regarding the Mid Staffordshire Foundation Trust. 2 p. III. Review of early warning systems in the NHS: acute and community services. National Quality Board. Feb 2010. 62 p. VI. Letter dated 23/02/2010 from Andy Burnham MP to Jo Williams (Interim Chair, Care Quality Commission) regarding failings of the Mid Staffordshire Foundation Trust. 1 p. V. Assuring the quality of senior NHS managers: report of the advisory group on assuring the quality of senior NHS managers. 37 p.
